# Data Science Books and Courses

Mostly free online.

## ML/Stats/DS

[Hands-on Machine Learning with R - Brad Boehmke & Brandon Greenwell](https://bradleyboehmke.github.io/HOML/)

[Data Visualisation - Kieran Healy](https://socviz.co/)

[Interpretable Machine Learning - Christoph Molnar](https://christophm.github.io/interpretable-ml-book/)

[Introduction to Data Science - Rafael A. Irizarry](https://rafalab.github.io/dsbook/)

[Practical Data Science with R - Nina Zumel and John Mount](https://www.manning.com/books/practical-data-science-with-r-second-edition). Limited free preview.

[Practical Data Science for Stats](https://peerj.com/collections/50-practicaldatascistats/). A collection of preprints curated by Hadley Wickham and Jenny Bryan. 

[Advanced Statistical Computing - Roger Peng](https://bookdown.org/rdpeng/advstatcomp/). Work in progress. Seems stalled. Topics include general optimisation, EM, Integration, Monte Carlo, MCMC. 

[Code Complete](http://aroma.vn/web/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/code-complete-2nd-edition-v413hav.pdf)

[Data Science at the Command Line](https://www.datascienceatthecommandline.com/)

[Standford Coursera ML series](https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning)

[Google ML crash course](https://developers.google.com/machine-learning/crash-course)

[Applied Statistics with R](https://daviddalpiaz.github.io/appliedstats/)

[R for Statistical Learning](https://daviddalpiaz.github.io/r4sl/)

[Applied Predictive Modelling](http://appliedpredictivemodeling.com/). Max Kuhn and Kjell Johnson.

[Feature Engineering and Selection](http://www.feat.engineering/index.html). Max Kuhn and Kjell Johnson

## R Specific

[R Porject Site - Books Related to R](https://www.r-project.org/doc/bib/R-books.html)

[What They Forgot to Teach You About R](https://whattheyforgot.org/)

[Advanced R 2nd Ed - Hadley Wickham](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/)

[Efficient R](https://csgillespie.github.io/efficientR/)

[R for Data Science - Hadley Wickham](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/) and [Solutions](https://jrnold.github.io/r4ds-exercise-solutions/)

[R Packages - Hadley Wickham](http://r-pkgs.had.co.nz/)

[Mastering Shiny](https://mastering-shiny.org/). HW. In development.

[Mastering Software Development in R](https://bookdown.org/rdpeng/RProgDA/). Roger Peng.

[Modern Dive](https://moderndive.com/index.html). Statistical Inference via Data Science. Modelling, Stat Inference and Tidyverse.

[R Programming for Data Science - Roger Peng](https://bookdown.org/rdpeng/rprogdatascience/)

[Text Mining with R](https://www.tidytextmining.com/)

[Learning Statistics with R](https://learningstatisticswithr.com/)

[R Graphics Cookbook](http://www.cookbook-r.com/Graphs/)

[Fundamentals of Data Visualization](https://serialmentor.com/dataviz/)

[Agile data Science with R](https://edwinth.github.io/ADSwR/)

[Plotly](https://plotly-r.com/index.html)

[Merely Useful: Using R for Research Software Engineering](https://merely-useful.github.io/r-rse/)

[Modern R with the Tidyverse](https://b-rodrigues.github.io/modern_R/)

[R Cookbook](https://rc2e.com/)

[Tidyverse Design Guide (book)](https://design.tidyverse.org/)

[3rd edition of ggplot book](https://ggplot2-book.org/index.html)
